cbinstall.name: JComments Tab
cbinstall.author: smart
cbinstall.description: Displays a tab with the last user comments

param.name: count
param.label: Comments Limit
param.description: Enter the maximum number of comments you would like listed in the tab

param.name: length
param.label: Max. number of characters
param.description: The number of characters to display

param.name: showsmiles
param.label: Show smiles
param.description: Select whether to show smiles as text or as images
